name: api_get_vps_backups
description:
Returns a list of all the current VPS backups indicating the VPS ID, the Name of
* the backup, file size, and a download URL

function.name: api_get_vps_backups
function.desc: Returns a list of all the current VPS backups indicating the VPS ID, the Name of the backup, file size, and a download URL

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

input_comment: * @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
